HeatObject:
(:action HeatObject
        :parameters (?r - receptacle ?a - agent ?l - location ?o - object)

        :precondition (and 
		(receptacleType ?r MicrowaveType)
		(atLocation ?a ?l)
		(receptacleAtLocation ?r ?l)
		(holds ?a ?o)
		)
        :effect (and 
		(isHot ?o)
		)
)
CoolObject:
(:action CoolObject
        :parameters (?r - receptacle ?a - agent ?l - location ?o - object)

        :precondition (and 
		(receptacleType ?r FridgeType)
		(atLocation ?a ?l)
		(receptacleAtLocation ?r ?l)
		(holds ?a ?o)
		)
        :effect (and 
		(isCool ?o)
		)
)
